creator: Promethean Designs
description:
Powerboat is the latest racing title published by Interplay . . . racing with the added challenge of water.

If you love speed and have the balls to try anything, Powerboat is the game for you. There are a total of 9 tracks in the full game including the hi-tech Mount Fuji, the sophistication of Monaco (complete with Formula One cars hurtling alongside the river).

As if high-speed river navigation wasn't enough there are obstacles and hurdles waiting around every corner, instantly increasing the tracks' difficulty. Miss jumps and suddenly your record time has disappeared into oblivion. Picture it, a police chase coming to its climax at the river's edge, cars colliding and crates crashing into the river ahead of you. This game is non-stop action! 


Keyboard Controls

              Move Left = Left arrow key
              Move Right = Right arrow key
              Accelerate = up arrow key.
              Trim Up = [ or ; key.
              Trim down = ' or / key

              Pause/Unpause = P
              Exit Race = ESCAPE
              Change View = Page Up/Down
              Help = F1
              TV Camera = F5
              Toggle map on/off = F6
              Zoom map =  F7/F8
              Screen shot = F12
              Cycle view between boats = Home/End.
              Increase/decrease engine volume = +/-.

Hint: You must race the Barracuda difficulty to earn the cheat.
subject: Windows games; Vintage computer games; Action games
title: VR Sports Powerboat Racing Demo
